editionStmt.edition: Unicode/XML Leningrad Codex (UXLC) UXLC 2.0 19 Oct 2023 27.1 19 Oct 2023 00:00

respStmt.resp: WLC2XML[21 Apr 2023] - Transcription from Michigan-Claremont encoding to Unicode with XML markings. See details in notes.
ScanReplace/EditWLC[30 Dec 2020] - Edits/removes transcription notes; removes MDs.
ScanReplace/InsertCGJs[29 Dec 2020] - Places CGJ in Jerusalem VUV words and leading metegs.

publicationStmt.distributor: Via web site: Christopher V. Kimball https://tanach.us/Tanach.xml mail@cvkimball.com

notesStmt.note: The original text file wlc420_ps.txt was provided by the Groves Center. The file has the MD5 hash: d31a 6a6e 9afa bf82 272c 2efb 0522 a12e and was dated 25 Jan 2016. Six transcription notes (5,7,F) have been moved to the noted character (Lev 11:42.4, Judg 18:30.11, Isa 9.6.1, Ps 80:14.3, Job 38:13.5, Job 38:15.2) to produce the file wlc420_ps_td.txt for conversion to Unicode and XML by the program WLC2XML. The only other changes to the Groves Center text are: The book names in English and Hebrew of the Jewish Publication Society Tanach and book abbreviations from the New Revised Standard Version have been added. MC code 32 added as atnah hafukh by Steve Salisbury, 30 Sep 2021. The atnah hafukh codepoint, x05a2, has been added to the character table; it does not appear in WLC 4.20.

correction.description: Add dagesh to bet, add paseq at end of word.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Damaged text. Add note 't'.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Move dagesh in shin to nun.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Add dagesh to gimel.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Change pashta to qadma to final kaf.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Add qadma to kaf.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Remove dagesh from nun.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Change mahapakh under resh to munah.

correction.description: Change munah under resh to mahapakh.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Change merkha to munah.
correction.author: Moshe Escott

correction.description: Add Unicode paseq at end of word, making a legarmeh after the bet.
correction.author: Moshe Greenberg

correction.description: Change patah to hataf-patah on ayin.
correction.author: Stephen Salisbury

correction.description: Remove dagesh from nun.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Remove dagesh from dalet.
correction.author: Moshe Greenberg

correction.description: Change pashta on aleph to qadma on tsadi.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Change segol under vav to patah. Add note 't'.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Remove sheva from final kaf.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Replace tipeha and patah from under resh with qamats. Poor text condition, add note 't'.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Add meteg under tav.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Move qadma on vav to the bet.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Remove sheva from under qof.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Add dagesh to yod.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Move qadma above initial vav to following bet.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Change hataf-segol below the aleph to a hataf-patah. Remove munah below he. Add note 't'.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Remove qadma above the kaf. Add note 't'.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Replace munah under lamed with meteg. Add maqaf to end of word. Add note 't'.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Change munah under the bet to a mahapakh.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Remove tipeha under aleph. Add note 't'
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Replace merkha under het with tipeha.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Replace hataf-patah under ayin with patah.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Remove dagesh on nun.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Move mahapakh under gimel to dalet.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

correction.description: Change merkha under nun to meteg. Add maqaf to end of word.

correction.description: Remove holam from lamed, add meteg to lamed.
correction.author: Daniel Holman

biblItem.title: The Leningrad Codex - A Facsimile Edition

imprint.publisher: The J. Alan Groves Center for Advanced Biblical Research ("Groves Center").

profileDesc.creation: From WLC 4.20 provided by the Groves Center.

note.note: Puncta extraordinaria -- an x05c4 is used to mark such marks in the text when they are above the line and an x05c5 when they are below the line.
Large letter(s). Shown as large letters.
Small letter(s). Shown as small letters.
Suspended letter(s). Shown as suspended letters.
Text is correct relative to LC. Usually this marks a peculiarity of the LC relative to the other Masoretic texts.
This tipeha is a dehi in other texts.
This meteg is a merkha in other texts.
Transcription uncertain. Examine the LC image for other possible readings.
This verse does NOT occur in the Leningrad Codex. Included for continuity of verse numbering.
